value:
$WmMPID_スリーズ声,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Oh, $Nu...
Soon, we will meet. I am overjoyed...$k$pI have something important to tell you
first, though. There is a ceremony in
Nifl called the Rite of Frost...$k$pIt is so powerful that it can extinguish
even the flames of Múspell.$k$pThe last to perform the ritual was my
mother, in her fight against Surtr. She
lost her life that day...$k$pThanks to that, I am sure that Surtr
thinks he is untouchable. That is
simply not true.$k$pInstead, I believe it was a ploy of my
mother's, designed to throw Surtr off
his guard.$k$pShe conducted the rite without the
necessary artifacts, you see...$k$pBut I have one of them with me. It is
called the Snjársteinn. And the other,
well... It is in your hands already.$k$pIt is the divine weapon, Breidablik.
Your weapon holds a very special
power—it can control the worlds.$k$pWhen we meet, I will entrust the
stone to you. And with it, you will be
able to guide us.$k$pIt will expose to us the path to the true
Rite of Frost and grant us the power
we need to defeat Surtr.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Losing Laegjarn in battle has thrown
the enemy into total disarray.$k$pThis kind of chance does not come
often. It's time to move!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Fjorm, how much longer till
we reach the sanctuary and meet
your sister, Princess Gunnthrá?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I would say that it will take us about
three more days to reach the
sanctuary at Snjárhof.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|All right. We need to hurry and break
through the enemy's lines, and then
head west. The princess is waiting!$k$p$Sbs150|
